item.title: i made the worst album ever
item.author: authen
item.description:
hahha.... long time no see...

if you haven't noticed, recently i dropped a producer rapper collab album with dope shit (his artist name is cracksmoulder, but i'll call him dope shit from now on)

do i think it is good? kind of

but... mashing together the genres experimental hip hop, noise, sound collage, ambient, atmospheric drum and bass, breakcore, chopped and screwed, industrial hip hop, pluggnb, midi music into this chaotic, raw and quirky 10 minute album was extremely fun and had some moments that turned out... actually listenable and good?

me and dope shit watching skibidi toilet gender swap and garten of banban annoying orange gaming was the funniest shit ever and turned into probably my best album

"lord forgive me, cause i fw u heavy ❤️" is one of the most chaotic ones on the album and turned out to be (in my opinion) my best song

"this nigga authen needs to stop using leroy snares" is probably the funniest in the whole album. this stupid fucking leroy snare bit and the "weee are the leroyyy snares" part is actually so funny to me

i experimented a lot with chopping and screwing in this album, which probably was the worst part

my chopping and screwing kinda sucked tbh, especially in "shout out 2 tha drainers"

also randomly

list of samples and people that can sue me and dope shit:

  • ericdoa - 2008
  • drowing pool - bodies
  • radiohead - 15 step midi
  • ghostbusters theme midi
  • technically amen break but no one cares no one has ever cleared an amen break
  • that one video of quinn where shes like im bladee drain gang
  • ihascupquake - mineblox (the one with you were always playing roblox)
  • SODA BY GLEN (PROD TREKYO & 7VENLYVES) *SLEEPINGTETSUO MIX*

yeah thats basically all i wanted to say

check out the authensmoulder website it got links to stuff its cool its comic sans

as of me writing this, authensmoulder is not on streaming, but it soon will. stay tuned!!!

item.title: authen is fucking DEAD!!!!!
item.author: authen
item.description:
guess who's computer and phone broke in the same week ME!!!!!

if you haven't noticed yet, for about 5 days (04/09/2023 to 08/09/2023), i have been completely inactive from the internet

i think i took too long to make this post but anyway

i broke my phone in 01/09/2023 cause it fell out of my table and the screen is completely broken... thats cool

then my computer's stabilizer thingy out of nowhere decided to not turn on

isnt that FUN!!!!!!

im on my moms chromebook rn which has access to:

  • my discord
  • spotify
  • rateyourmusic (not ~mrdjkhaled [which i think is not linked here yet but thats my main account], its ~leftwingkanyewest)
  • last.fm
  • and most importantly, neocities

now lets talk about the cool gimmicks...

SONG OF THE DAY!!!!!!!!

out of london, by heavensouls!!!

i lvoe this song so much, the production, the singing, the music video, its too good. cant wait to see pyky's future!!! stream and buy debut

CAT OF THE DAY!!!!!!!

shes so me shes just like me shes so silly!!! love her

silly lil update post bye

item.title: let's try this again... again
item.author: authen
item.description:
guess who deleted their blog for the 3rd time!!! thats me baby!!! yeah the blog who no one cared is now back

i deleted the zonelets blog again cause i just felt it didnt match the layout of my site + it randomly broke

we now have cool daily gimmicks like

THE SONG OF THE DAY!!!!

lips by jane remover!!!!

this song is sooooo beautiful, janes voice is amazing on this and im really excited for the album, the production is insane too

but thats not the only one cool daily gimmick...

CAT PICTURE OF THE DAY!!!!!!!!!

so true

bye
